name: Kusanali bot
description: A multipurpose bot made for the discord server The Academia | Kusanali Mains

ACTIVITY_TYPE.description: The activity the bot is doing.

PYMONGO_URI.description: The connection URI for your database.

OWNERS.description: Comma separated user IDs of people that are allowed to use owner only commands.

STATUS.description: Your bot current status displayed after the activity type
